attributes.action: I refuse to accept the Brexit decision of the UK from the EU - for our children
attributes.additional_details:
Farage, Johnson and Gove have crashed our economy in 24 hours. Losing £350 Billion
Plus -The bankers have been paid an extra £250 Billion today via quantative easing - in a time of austerity that amount has been found for them? Not for the NHS and schools?

Farage has suggested private insurance to replace the NHS, when yesterday children with EU funded medicines have been told they will stopped on Brexit

I want the decision over turned and a new government. 
No Brexit
A New Vote 
New Hope
attributes.background: The EU referendum polled only 17 million wishing to leave the EU of a 65 million population - at least 30 million registered to vote did not wish to leave, also, due to blatant lies from the Brexit campaign and impact to our economy, (retracted as mistakes...) many who voted Brexit would not today
